Governments around the world use war games to run through scenarios and test responses for literally anything from health emergencies to World War III.
Typically, they're conducted in secret, with the blue and the red teams pitched against each other, each able to act as they choose.
In our scenario, though, the red team, while free to make some choices, is already aware of the key steps it will take.
